name: ed_erase_above
description: ED mode 1 erases everything above cursor position (all prior rows + current row up to cursor)
comment: Print ABCDE at row 0, CUP(2,1) → (1,0), print FGHIJ at row 1, CUP(2,3) → (1,2), ED(1) erases: all of row 0 + row 1 cols 0-2; I(1,3) and J(1,4) survive; cursor at (1,2)
